newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - DeKalb County, Ga.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - DeKalb County, Ga.

text.p: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO SELL NOTES
Sealed bids will be received by the Director of Finance of DeKalb County, in the offices of the Department of Finance, 1300 Commerce Drive, Decatur, Georgia, 30030, at:

for Tax Anticipation Notes. The Notes will be dated March 13, 1997, the anticipated delivery date. Principal and interest will be payable on December 31, 1997. Interest will accrue from March 13, 1997, to the maturity date and will be calculated on the basis of a 360-day year, comprised of twelve 30-day months.

Copies of the Preliminary Official Statement, Notice of Sale and Bid form may be obtained from the undersigned or from the County's financial advisors, Joseph E. Lay, 3414 Peachtree Road, N.E. Suite 1010, Atlanta, Georgia 30326, Tel: (404) 233-0292; or DOBBS RAM&COMPANY, 615 Peachtree Street, Suite 1200, Atlanta Georgia 30308, Tel: (404) 897- 1033.
